long_description: Keep your daily essentials safe and handy with the PacSafe VentureSafe 10L GII Front Daypack. Works as a backpack, or as a front pack that wears well with or without a larger pack in back. Areas of the pack most commonly vulnerable to slash-and-run thefts have slashproof, high-tensile stainless-steel eXomesh(R) wire laminated between the nylon layers. Padded, slashproof and snatchproof shoulder straps contain high-tensile stainless-steel wire; smart buckles confuse and delay would-be thieves with dual-release buttons. Zipper pulls can be attached to discreet security hooks or hidden by a hypalon tab to prevent pickpockets. RFID-blocking pocket protects passports and credit and debit cards from unauthorized scanning. Zippered main compartment has a large zippered mesh pocket; 2 side stretch pockets hold a water bottle or umbrella; zippered front compartment has mesh pocket for small items. Internal padded sleeve accomodates a tablet. Molded EVA backing on the PacSafe VentureSafe 10L GII Front Daypack has air flow channels to keep you cool.
short_description: Keep your daily essentials safe and handy with the PacSafe VentureSafe 10L GII Front Daypack. Works as a backpack, or as a front pack that wears well with or without a larger pack in back.
